versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Combines content sections into complete documents

schema.prompt:
Assemble content sections into a complete, polished document:

Introduction Content: {{input.introductionContent}}
Body Content: {{input.bodyContent}}
SEO Elements: {{input.seoElements}}
Conclusion Guidelines: {{input.conclusionGuidelines}}

Create complete assembled document:

1. Document Integration:
   - Seamless section transitions
   - Consistent tone and style
   - Logical content flow
   - Unified narrative voice
   - Coherent message delivery

2. Content Quality Assurance:
   - Grammar and spelling check
   - Sentence structure review
   - Paragraph flow optimization
   - Redundancy elimination
   - Clarity improvements

3. Structure Optimization:
   - Header hierarchy validation
   - Bullet point consistency
   - Section balance assessment
   - Reading flow enhancement
   - Visual organization

4. SEO Integration:
   - Natural keyword placement
   - Meta elements incorporation
   - Internal linking suggestions
   - Featured snippet optimization
   - Search intent alignment

5. Conclusion Development:
   - Key points summarization
   - Call-to-action creation
   - Next steps guidance
   - Reader engagement closing
   - Value reinforcement

6. Final Polish:
   - Professional formatting
   - Engaging subheadings
   - Transition improvements
   - Readability optimization
   - Impact maximization

7. Quality Metrics:
   - Word count analysis
   - Readability score
   - Engagement potential
   - SEO effectiveness
   - Value delivery assessment

Return as structured JSON with keys: finalDocument, conclusionText, qualityMetrics (object), improvementSuggestions (array), formattingNotes (array), publicationChecklist (array).
